author: chay_z123
content: So we have had success in resynching holesky nodes to the latest block, but once we got in synch  we are seeing constant restarts. Is anyone else seeing this issue and if so how were you able to resolve it?

content: which version of prysm are you trying? and we've had good success with lighthouse(use beta.0 release) or teku(use latest develop) for e.g.
